Invent new forms of renewable energy: Da Vinci was fascinated by the works of engineering and mechanics, and he would be amazed by the technological advancements in renewable energy today. I would ask him to invent new forms of renewable energy, such as solar-powered flying machines or wind-powered water pumps, that could help reduce our reliance on fossil fuels and mitigate climate change.

Create a virtual reality experience of historical events: Da Vinci was known for his artistic skills, and I would love to see him use his talents to create a virtual reality experience of historical events. He could use his knowledge of anatomy and perspective to create a realistic and immersive experience of battles, ceremonies, or other important historical moments.

Design a new form of transportation: Da Vinci was fascinated by the movement of machines and the human body, and he would be intrigued by the electric and self-driving cars of today. I would ask him to design a new form of transportation that combines his knowledge of engineering and anatomy to create a faster, more efficient, and more environmentally friendly mode of transportation.
